Title: BridgeDb Java
Description: BridgeDb is a framework to map identifiers between various biological databases and related resources. These mappings are provided for genes, proteins, metabolites, metabolic reactions, diseases, complexes and publications. BridgeDb includes a Java library that provides an API for programmatic access.
Dependencies: Apache Derby, Apache Commons CLI, RDF4J
Source code: {{Replace by link to the source code}}
Citation instructions: If you use this software in your work, please cite Van Iersel, M. P., Pico, A. R., Kelder, T., Gao, J., Isaac, H., Hanspers, K., Conklin, B. R., & Evelo, C. T. (2010). The BridgeDb framework: standardized access to gene, protein and metabolite identifier mapping services. BMC Bioinformatics, 11(5). https://doi.org/10.1186/1471-2105-11-5
